text: Nihsansaya, mothya totyata padale te loka jyanni allahaci bheta honyala khote tharavile, yethaparyanta ki jevha ti nirdharita vela tyancyavara acanaka ye'ila, tevha mhanatila, ki arere! Kheda ahe amacya sustibaddala ji ya babatita jhali ani tyanci avastha asi ho'ila ki apale ojhe apalya kamarevara laduna ghetalele asatila. Savadhana! Te mothee va'ita ojhe laduna ghetila
